remarks.format: ## Remarks 还可以通过使用作为命中测试参数来对视觉对象执行命中测试, 并将结果作为返回。You can also perform a hit test on a visual object by using a as a hit test parameter, and return the result as a .

The value of the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性描述与目标可视对象之间的交集。 The property describes the intersection between a and the target visual object. 下图显示了命中测试几何图形 (蓝色圆圈) 与目标对象 (红色正方形) 之间的关系。The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the target object (the red square). ![命中测试中使用的 System.windows.media.geometryhittestresult.intersectiondetail 关系图](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "命中测试中使用的 System.windows.media.geometryhittestresult.intersectiondetail 关系图")![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") 命中测试几何图形与目标对象之间的交集The intersection between a hit test geometry and a target object ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性。The following example shows how to use the property of . [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)]
